snippet: The Mets seek a second team to share their spring training facility in Port St. Lucie, Florida, because it would generate more revenue and ensure another team does not depart the region.
abstract: New York Mets seek second team to share their spring training facility in Port St Lucie, Fla, because it would generate more revenue and ensure that at least one other team will stay in the area.
lead_paragraph: The Mets seek a second team to share their spring training facility in Port St. Lucie, Florida, because it would generate more revenue and ensure another team does not depart the region.

headline.seo: Mets Want Spring Training Company on Florida’s East Coast
headline.main: With Isolation Looming, Mets Look for Company on Florida’s East Coast
headline.print_headline: With Isolation Looming, Mets Look for Company On Florida’s East Coast
